amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding made available in this bill from paying the salaries of specific positions in the Council on Environmental Quality.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-208 to prohibit funding made available in this bill from paying the salaries of specific positions in the Council on Environmental Quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 282 (Roll no. 558).
